snippet.title: Hollywood Animal — Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Make movies, even if someone has to die. The demo for Hollywood Animal is now available on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2680550/Hollywood_Animal/?utm_medium=demotrailer&utm_source=youtube

In the new strategy game from the creators of This Is the Police, you'll find yourself in the chair of a Hollywood executive, in the midst of the Great Depression. Enter tense negotiations, make unpleasant compromises, face war and social upheaval – and remember, art always requires sacrifice. 

Check news on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WeappyStudio
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/@WeappyStudio

#hollywoodanimal #hollywoodanimalgame #hagame #Weappy #steam #thisisthepolice #titp
